_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six topics for recollection [an6.26:: Recollection of one's own ethical precepts
The qualities of the Realized One [an6.2: Supreme guide for those who wish to train
So that sensible people can know it for themselves
The qualities of the Saṅgha [an6.26:8.2]: Consists of the four pairs, the eight individuals
Worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods
Worthy of greeting with joined palms
The supreme field of merit for the world
The qualities of one's own generosity [a: Rid of the stain of stinginess
Loving to give and to share
The qualities of the deities [an6.26:8.2: The Gods of the Four Great Kings
The Gods Who Love to Create
The Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
Reborn there because of their faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
